S

scan() - Method in class robowars.interpreter.Interpreter
A method for counting the number of visible pieces, based on the current piece.
scanArea(PieceEnum, HexCoord) - Method in class robowars.board.Board
This method takes in the enumeration that represents the piece that is performing the scan operation and the target coordinate of the hexagon space, which must be a valid coordinate, that is being scanned and then returns a list of HexCoord elements representing the coordinates that are determined to be occupied.
scanArea() - Method in class robowars.board.Board
An overloaded version of scanArea() for use in the Interpreter.
scanCurrentArea() - Method in class robowars.board.Board
Scans the area around the current piece
scanSpace(HexCoord) - Method in class robowars.board.Board
This method takes in one coordinate of a hexagon space, which must be valid coordinate, and returns a list of pieces determined to be occupying the space.
